feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: SE 38 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 100. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
